Hello all,

We first created MiniKVM.com which is already very succesfull. Our clients love their machines, our support and even more the price! However, some customers required more juice so that’s why we now created MaxiKVM.com as well! Same low prices, same hardware, same network, same perks just bigger specs and a slightly bigger bill.

Down to business, what’s in this offer:

  • KVM VPS with Virtualizor control panel.
  • 2 - 4 vCPUs Xeon Silver (configurable, Fair share CPU usage)
  • 2048, 3072 or 4096 Dedicated ECC RAM (configurable)
  • 20 GB, 30 GB or 40 GB NVMe SSD disk drive (configurable)
  • 10 GBps down / 2 GBps upload (Shared)
  • 1 TB, 2 TB or 4 TB traffic (configurable)
  • Location: Frankfurt, Germany.
  • OS: Most Linux distros (Windows ISOs available, BYOL)
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • 1x /80 IPv6 subnet
  • Fully managable DDoS Protection (Network - MaxiKVM)
  • Instant setup! (Depending on stock and fraud check).

These specs min € 29 to max € 49,- each year! (depending on configuration) plus tax if you’re from Europe.
